subject: Fashion
title: Dopamine Dressing Movement
description: A quick, practical guide to Dopamine Dressing Movement.

hook.text: After COVID lockdowns ended, the world dressed in neon, hot pink, and lime green.

buildup.text: Psychologists observed people choosing bright colors to boost post-pandemic mood.

discovery.text: 'Dopamine dressing' named the phenomenonâ€”wearing color as emotional medicine.

twist.text: Studies show bright clothing improves the wearer's mood more than the viewer's.

climax.text: Valentino's all-pink collection and Bottega's green became dopamine uniforms.

punchline.text: Sometimes you don't dress for others. You dress for serotonin.

quiz.question: What triggered the dopamine dressing movement?
options: Post-COVID desire for mood-boosting bright colors
